citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on
08-JAN-18.
Family member indicated licensee was gone with missionary work to Africa for the next 2 weeks.
